Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers' feedback is more specific to the assignment requirement, AI's feedback is usually general, and comments on whether the work is logical and reasonable.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: No, both feedback is encouraging and is able to point out what I shall improve on
